title: [Gameplay] Cassiopeia Bot - Still wants boots?
body:
Game lasted long enough for items to be available, certainly 4 kills should warrant some items, but appears the buy script logic checks for boots, since with the new passive no boots, it never buys anything besides the doran's ring.

Impact - Easier bot game

replies.body:
Updated Cass shouldn't need boots because she now gets movement speed per level. She actually is locked out from buying boots for this reason! She is a snake, after all. ;) 

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/dd1662d5e3a6595615bc9cfb6366b880.jpg
I believe the actual question was about why the bot never got any items. They were suggesting the inability to buy boots as a possible cause.
Hmm. Okay, lemme check in with the peeps who handle bots!
Pls KateyKhaos, the bots are still buying boots enchantments after the patch. Cheating is against the ToS. Ban the bots pls.
